property.name: displayVariant
property.label: Display Option
property.description: Select the default format of the card. Options are None (flat), Featured (drop shadow), and Outline (flat with border).

property.name: showViewSelector
property.label: Show View Selector
property.description: Allow users to select the Vertical (Card), Horizontal (List), and Table view types.

property.name: showTable
property.label: Show Table View
property.description: Allow users to display files and folders in Table view.

property.name: showList
property.label: Show List View
property.description: Allow users to display files and folders in List view.

property.name: showCard
property.label: Show Card View
property.description: Allow users to display files and folders in Card view.

property.name: paginationVariant
property.label: Pagination Type
property.description: 'Default' provides standard previous/next functionality. 'Paging' provides individual page numbers.

property.name: showSort
property.label: Show Sort by
property.description: Select to display the Sort By tool.

property.name: defaultSort
property.label: Default Sorting
property.datasource: Name (A to Z),Name (Z to A),Type (A to Z),Type (Z to A),File Size (Smallest to Largest),File Size (Largest to Smallest),Date (Newest),Date (Oldest)
property.description: Select the default Sort By option.

property.name: sortVariant
property.label: Sort Label Variant
property.description: Select 'Standard' to display the Sort By Label or 'Label-hidden' to hide it.

property.name: listId
property.label: List Id
property.description: Unique ID for the list results. Allows multiple list components to exist on a page. This property relates this component to a specific list.
